item.title: 使用Github Actions自动部署Hugo至Github Pages
item.description: 生成repo的token 首先需要在个人设置中生成GitHub token，并将其添加到对应repo，在下述的Github Actions配置文件中引用，以使得自动构建能够推送生成的静态文件至repo中。 添加workflow 在hugo项目根目录中新建.github/workflows/gh-pages.yml，内容如下： name: github pages on: push: branches: - master jobs: deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-18.04 steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v2 #with: # submodules: true # Fetch Hugo themes # fetch-depth: 0 # Fetch all history for .GitInfo and .Lastmod - name: Setup Hugo uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v2 with: hugo-version: '0.68.3' extended: true - name: Build run: hugo --minify - name: Deploy uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 with: github_token: ${{ secrets.TOKEN }} publish_dir: ./public cname: blog.
